name: The Great Cosmic Enterprise
desc:
In a virtual exhibition hall sculpted from data, the exhibition representatives exchanged opinions.
Two figures moved between the booths, delivering everything needed by each party.
"Hmm, are you...?"
"I've seen you on TV."
They talked about games, food, each other's morphologies, and all the beautiful things in the universe.
Though their meetings were few and far between, they were as close as old friendsâ€”
"By the way, have you thought about my proposal..."
"The Express is not for sale!"

ranks.desc: Increases the wearer's ATK by #1[i]%. For every 1 different Weakness Type an enemy target has, increases the DMG dealt to it by the wearer by #2[i]%. Up to a max of 7 Weakness Types can be taken into account for this effect.
